summary: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.
cast: Paul Rudd|Jennifer Aniston|Justin Theroux|Alan Alda|Malin Akerman|Ken Marino|Joe Lo Truglio|Kathryn Hahn|Kerri Kenney|Lauren Ambrose|Michaela Watkins|Jordan Peele|Linda Lavin|Jessica St. Clair|Todd Barry|Martin Thompson|Ian Patrick|John D'Leo|David Wain|Michael Showalter|Michael Ian Black|Zandy Hartig|Keegan-Michael Key|Mather Zickel|Juan Piedrahita|Peter Salett|Patricia French|Nina Hellman|Richard Allan Jones|Juana Samayoa|David Cardenas|Sharon Lubin|Vester Grayson|Ronald McFarlin|Roger Parham-Brown|Jim Moffatt|Sung-Suk Garber|Craig Wedren|Amy Miles|Charles Gansa|Roberto Zincone|Fran Capitanelli|Marvel Bell|Gerald Duckworth|Ron Goss|Rosemary Howard|Mark Keever|Scott Ledbetter|Ray Liotta|Tabatha Minchew|Nina Nayebi|Katherine Neslund|Trisha Paytas|Ron Raines|Joel Rogers|Frank Scozzari|Gregory Marshall Smith|Jacob Wingfield
title: Sácame del paraíso
